author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
92x L1T integration ( replaces #19104)

This contains l1t-integration developments upto tag v95.16. 

Total of 57 files (31 C++, 26 expert level configuration .py files).

Included features:

- EG: new extended H/E, plus 2nd isolation WP (aka 2016)
- MET
   - Emulator bug fix when getting address using ieta for MET PUS LUT, make consistent counting in emulator/fw (0/1).
   - saturate when there is a saturated ECAL or HCAL TP + Saturate MET Demux (fix).
- Tau adding trimming + shape veto dummy LUT
- EG/Tau  clustering filtering fix in emulator to describe fw: explore TT30 the veto procedure when finding maxima.
- caloParams (default 2017_v1_8)
  - caloParams2017_v1_7 to reflect current online conditions.
  - **caloParams **2017_v1_8** (same as v1_7 except layer1HFScaleFactors are now lower, as no longer divided by 0.7).
   - caloParams_2017_v1_8_2, enabling the 2nd iso EG WP.

- new L1TReEmul workflows: 
  - L1TReEmulMCFromRAWSimEcalTP
  - L1TReEmulMCFromRAWSimHcalTP
  - L1TReEmulMCFromRAWSimCalTP. 
  - L1TReEmulMCFrom90xRAWSimHcalTP, suitable for 90x MC samples which contain simHcalUnsuppressedDigis.
title: Pr92x L1T Calo (EG, MET, Tau)  2017 emulation of startup (up to l1t integration v95.15)
